Name: Cuban Master
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
History: A classic cocktail discovered in 1999 during a trip to in Cuba.
Nutrition: One serving of Cuban Master contains 232 calories
